full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Screen: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ww7fe7fidntmwf8/AADBXFHcdHrTwLC-0HEvP3yha?dl=0 (either one)

1912: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/nn2d462wnv6rtsy/AAAhUDSuTOorF4BZJgSsGIhga?dl=0

Will try get carpet artwork across to you later today, otherwise leave as is for now.

Thanks

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

We are updating these at the moment. 

Can you please send the sample images for these products as we don't seem to have them on file:

  • Screen Chip
  • 1912 sample Chips (all)
  • Monitor folder
  • Latin folder
  • Elemental folder
  • Flinders folder

Hey there,

Few images need tweaking below. Pixel should be of pixel chip, screens should be of screens chip. Also those images of 1912 are of the full box set - but there are images per design collection that need to be added here. Printed sample image also needs to be fixed.



Few carpet folder images haven't been updated here - have we suppled these to you yet? If not LMK and I'll send across.



And is there a reason why this is the default image for the printed ceiling samples selected? If anything I would go with Plywood image for all… or else the print that they've selected? Rather than the 'Chevron Fractured' image for all



FYI when a full color box is selected (across full colour wall, ceiling tile, ceiling panel, desk divider, clouds & baffles), this is the msg below. Can we change ALL to just 'Full Color Box'? (but still want the page/collection info to be sent through to the sales team if possible)



Do we need this 'apply coupon' field or can we remove?



On the acoustic art page I reckon we should delete the 'Request a sample' button altogether… and they can contact us if they want samples of this collection. Stock gap solution.



And notice this notification hasn't been updated yet. Can we change to something like 'Your sample order has been received' or something?



Is this set up to go through to customercare.au yet? Would like to conduct testing and training with our internal team.

The Zapier notification subject line - can this please also be corrected to match the staff notification? Something like 'New sample request' or something unique to the actual form they are submitting?



Thanks. That's it for now but chat more this afternoon.

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com

Hey Joel,

Thanks I'll take a look at the sampling and come back to you.

We'll need this going to our customer care inbox. I think Heath should be across setting this up.

Thanks

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager

We have updated the site. You can now have a look. 

Regarding the testing purposes email. When you submit an order, admin email receives it (currently set to support@wpperk.com) and customer email (The email you use when you submits an order)

Let me know how you went with the audit and I'll jump in and take a look?

Thanks!
